article_title: ADP's Top Line Rises On New Business Bookings, Pays Per Control

article_metadata.author: Great Speculations

og.description: Automatic Data Processing announced its second quarter fiscal 2015 results on February 5. The human capital management company reported a 7% year-on-year increase in its revenue, crossing $2.6 billion, and tracking the lower end of its guidance. ADP's second quarter results benefited from solid growth in new business bookings and [...]
